column4: anyone else experiences flash video somtimes to play really quick or sound to be muted? I can't watch youtube unless I restart my computer now.
what browsers have you tried
Is it a common problem?
can be
what make and model system?
asus k53 laptop
why was that not in the initial question?
do you have the latest BIOS?
I might not, but how can I know if 12.04 will support that?
you may need a windows OS to do it :(. Check to see what fixes the newer BIOS gives. You may not need it if you get no ACPI fixes
no thanks :)
so, why didn't you mention the make and model of the system in the initial question?
does it matter, I want to have a broad audience
yes because it uniquely identifys the components in the system and we can also search for bugs for the model
does it have a dual video chip? Intel and nvidia for example?
Ok but now you know it right
no ati
if you run:  sudo lshw -C display    do you see an intel GPU too?
I believe this Asus' model is k53U
let me check
good, that makes life a tonne easier
try the boot option: acpi_backlight=vendor
ok
